rand::dist::uniform

Function rand::dist::uniform::uniform01 [−] [src]

pub fn uniform01<T: SampleUniform01, R: Rng>(rng: &mut R) -> T

Sample values uniformly over the half-open range [0, 1)

This method has precisely two template parameters. To fix the output type, use the syntax uniform01::<f64, _>(rng).
